# init(assetWriterInput:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new caption adaptor that writes to the specified asset writer input.

## Declaration

```swift
init(assetWriterInput input: AVAssetWriterInput)
```

## Parameters

- **input**: The asset writer input.
title: init(assetWriterInput:)
